isopy.load¶

A set of function and classes for reading Isotope and Ratio data from files.

isopy.load.csvfile(filepath, header=False, skip_first_n_rows=0, skip_first_n_columns=0, empty_string_default=None)[source]¶
isopy.load.reference_isotope_data(filepath=None, header=True, **kwargs)[source]¶
isopy.load.load_standard_ratio_data(filepath=None, header=True)[source]¶
isopy.load.isotope_array(filepath, **kwargs)[source]¶
isopy.load.ratio_array(filepath, **kwargs)[source]¶
class isopy.load.neptune(file)[source]¶

Used to read data files produced by a Neptune ICP-MS.

Parameters:
  • info (dict) – A dict of the information provided in the begining of the file (if given)
  • lines (dict) – A dict with the lines specified in the file.
